io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event

Interface NanoleafEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.here.oksse.ServerSentEvent.Listener

    public interface NanoleafEventListener
extends com.here.oksse.ServerSentEvent.Listener
    A listener for listening to events from a Nanoleaf device. A listener can be registered on a Nanoleaf device using the NanoleafDevice.registerEventListener(NanoleafEventListener, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean) method.
